name: RUDP4J
short_description: A java implementation of reliable-udp protocol based on the draft provided at http://www3.ietf.org/proceedings/99mar/I-D/draft-ietf-sigtran-reliable-udp-00.txt. Implemented on top of UDP as a light-weight alternative to TCP.
